name: Sacred Life Animation
description:
Using this Sacred Geometry art and music you can elevate life force and reduce stress. Or you can simply enjoy the art. Be the change.  

The technique is simple. A 7-4-7 mediation is easy to do.  

Method:

7-seconds inward breath, 4-second hold, 7-second slow outward breath.

Most experience relief after just a few minutes. 15-minutes or more and you will feel elevated.  Each day over a 21-day cycle will activate your chakras. 

Or simply just enjoy this art. 

Namaste
